titleStmt.title: A true and exact relation of the strange finding out of Moses his tombe, in a valley neere unto Mount Nebo in Palestina. With divers remarkable occurrences that happened thereupon, and the severall judgements of many learned men concerning the same. / Communicated by a person of quality residing at Constantinople, to a person of honour here in England, and by him permitted to be published, for the satisfaction of the ingenious.
titleStmt.author: Chaloner, Thomas, 1595-1661.
Geōrgarinēs, Iōsēph, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Richard Lowndes, at the White Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Described by Anthony à Wood as a hoax and ascribed by him to Thomas Chaloner, 1595-1661. Also attributed to Ioseph Geōrgarinēs. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 31"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the White Lion in St. Paul's Church-yard.
